Signature; Inscription; Date
Cardboard strip on former backing sheet with ormanemtal pattern in pencil with inscription [CATALANA]/Barcelona 1963

see Signed
medium: Pen, brush, brown ink and wash, yellow green wash, gold foil collage element on paper
signed: UR, LR in brown ink: [Cuevas]; LL in brown ink: [Barcelona 63]; Verso: UL in black ink: [José Luis Cuevas \'Mujer CATALANA\' Barcelona. ABRIL 1963]
title: Catalan Woman
